No. 0-42055/APC/Circular/AS/06//060/ Dated /Z Nov06
CIRCULAR No. AS- 22/2006
Subject: Interaction of CISF personnel with Press/Media

It has been felt that information about alerts being issued from
FHQ/Airport Sector HQ and details of steps to be taken during these
situations are appearing in the press/media. This leads to un-intended
panic/anxiety amongst the travelling public and at the same time, it does
not serve any public interest. It also encourages mischief-mongers to
indulge in pranks for the sake of cheap fun/sadistic pleasure. As far as,
interaction with the press/media is concerned, there are well known
rules/norms governing the same. A very strict view has been taken about
this kind of indiscretion on the part of the CISF personnel.

DisG/Airport, CASOs and all gazetted officers of the units should
ensure that such information is passed on to the CISF personnel only
during briefing to the extent necessary from operational point of view and
‘on a need to know basis. There should be no unauthorized contact with
the press/media in these matters. All concerned to ensure immediate
compliance.
